name: Blood Bay
description:
Blood Bay is a 4-player open-world survival RPG. In a Fabulous Fantasy setting.
Which is set on magical islands. Each island is different from each other, vegetation, trees, locations, history.

You are an adventurer who stumbles upon a small island on his journey. Out of a thirst to find the treasured treasure, your hero opens a cursed chest and a trap where you are kidnapped by dark magic in another dimension.

Functions:
● Multiplayer! Survive alone or with 4 friends in multiplayer co-op!
● Magic! Use magic, burn, heal, teleport.
● Craft! Craft survival gear, weapons, armor and more to survive!
● Build! Build your own Hut.
● Research! Explore the islands, find secrets, resources, artifacts.
● Character customization! Create any character you like!
● Fight! Protect yourself and your hut from the dangers of the island.
